content.raw:
The right camera appears to align with lidar and stereo data, but the left camera does not align.  

This issue was seen in #22 and resolved, but seems to have reared it's ugly head.

The attached image shows RViz view with right camera on top, and left camera on bottom.  The painted stereo point cloud is shown in both, and aligns with the right camera.  Significant shift seen in left camera
